data.title: Lluís Martínez Sistach donates to Royal Academy a miscellany book on his pastoral work
data.meta_description: Lluís Martínez Sistach, Archbishop Emeritus of Barcelona and elected academician of honor of the Royal European Academy of Doctors-Barcelona 1914 (RAED) has donated a copy of the book “Pastura les meves ovelles. Miscel.lània d’homenatge al cardenal Lluís Martínez Sistach” (Feed my sheep. Miscellaneous tribute to Cardinal Lluís Martínez Sistach), published by the Ateneo University Sant […]
data.text: Lluís Martínez Sistach, Archbishop Emeritus of Barcelona and elected academician of honor of the Royal European Academy of Doctors-Barcelona 1914 (RAED) has donated a copy of the book “Pastura les meves ovelles. Miscel.lània d’homenatge al cardenal Lluís Martínez Sistach” (Feed my sheep. Miscellaneous tribute to Cardinal Lluís Martínez Sistach), published by the Ateneo University Sant Pacià with articles, among others, of academician Francesc Torralba.
